about_the_game:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/main_capsule_616x353_yosemite.jpg

Search and Rescue: Yosemite
This DLC will include huge map of major Yosemite Park trails.
Five times bigger map than Tatra National Park!
All locations, trails, landmarks are based on real environment.



SAR: Yosemite DLC will bring:
- huge Yosemite map based on real locations
- new Hexes - travel faster using roads
- new Cards - exclusive for the Park
- new and improved Items - use Your Snowbike to reach Tourists faster
- new Customization options and more
There is more to come in SAR: Yosemite

Available August 2023

Our thanks to Yosemite National Park Team and all Search and Rescue Teams around the WORLD! Respect!

Wishlist and Follow and we`ll keep You informed.
